name: @goldstack/infra-aws
description: Utilities to work with AWS infrastructure via the cli.
author: Max Rohde

scripts.hello: git diff --quiet HEAD^...HEAD -- . && git diff --quiet -- . && git diff --quiet --staged -- .  || echo 'Hello World'
scripts.generate-schema: ts-json-schema-generator --tsconfig tsconfig.generate.json --no-type-check --path './src/types/**/*' --type 'AWSConfiguration' -o src/schemas/accountConfigSchema.json && ts-json-schema-generator --tsconfig tsconfig.generate.json --no-type-check --path './src/types/**/*' --type 'AWSDeployment' -o src/schemas/deploymentConfigSchema.json && ts-json-schema-generator --tsconfig tsconfig.generate.json --no-type-check --path './src/types/**/*' --type 'AWSTerraformState' -o src/schemas/awsTerraformStateSchema.json
scripts.patch-when-changed: git diff --quiet HEAD^...HEAD -- . && git diff --quiet -- . && git diff --quiet --staged -- .  || yarn version patch
